body.p: Young Mr Throckmorton Forman, of this county was convicted at the present term of the Mason Circuit Court, on his own confession, of the offense of shooting in sudden heat & passion &c, and fined $50, He is a worthy, clever young gentleman, with no means to pay the fine, and no doubt sincirly laments the rash and passionate act, I hope you will remit the fine, as his is a proper subject, and this a proper case for your clemency,
